attributes.title: DELETE!
attributes.review: I did this because our so called “president” is a horrible man. He talks dirty about women, including his daughter. I don’t think we should vote for him, he should be taken down!

attributes.title: absolutely horrifying

attributes.title: Trump

attributes.title: incredibly disturbing

attributes.title: Worst app ever
